input.oldString:
body: JSON.stringify({
          text: text.trim(),
          sourceLang: from,
          targetLang: to,
          domain: selectedDomain,
          glossary: glossary.filter(entry => entry.domain === selectedDomain || entry.domain === 'general')
        }),
input.newString:
body: JSON.stringify({
          text: applyGlossary(text.trim(), from, to),
          sourceLang: from,
          targetLang: to,
          domain: selectedDomain,
          glossary: glossary.filter(entry => entry.domain === selectedDomain || entry.domain === 'general')
        }),
